metadata.title: CVE-2020-16043 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient data validation in networking in Google Chrome prior to87.0.4280.141 allowed a remote attacker to bypass discretionary accesscontrol via malicious network traffic.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
